{this._viewEdit}
); } _doiTrangThai = () =>{ this.setState({ trangthai: !this.state.trangthai }); } _viewEdit(){ // if(this.state.trangthai === true){ return( YÊU CẦU SỮA CHỮA ); } } export default Tchc;
